Johnnie Walker Blue Label CNY

Dive into a cask of Johnnie Walker Blue Label and discover the enchanted forest of the Wood Dragon.At the heart of its lair, we find our Limited-Edition Blue label bottle. It features an innovativeand dynamic interpretation of the 2024â€™s Zodiac animal, the noble Wood Dragon. Regarded by many asthe mightiest of all the Zodiac animals, the dragon is symbolic of life and creativity as well as asign of future prosperity as an echo of the the Johnnie Walker motto, Keep Walking.

The task was to unpack the key visual for different formats and deliver a global toolkit,considering the essential markets US, China, and Global Travel
